summary.span: 將等候共用資源獨佔存取權限的特定作業系統物件封裝起來。

span.span: Encapsulates operating system-specific objects that wait for exclusive access to shared resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別封裝原生作業系統同步處理控制代碼，而且用來代表所有在執行階段允許多個等候作業的同步處理物件。The class encapsulates a native operating system synchronization handle and is used to represent all synchronization objects in the runtime that allow multiple wait operations. 如需與其他同步處理物件的等候控制代碼的比較，請參閱 < [ 同步處理原始物件概觀](~/docs/standard/threading/overview-of-synchronization-primitives.md)。For a comparison of wait handles with other synchronization objects, see [Overview of Synchronization Primitives](~/docs/standard/threading/overview-of-synchronization-primitives.md). 本身的類別是抽象的。The class itself is abstract. 類別衍生自定義訊號的機制，以指示耗時或釋放存取共用資源，但是會使用繼承方法來封鎖而等待存取共用資源。Classes derived from define a signaling mechanism to indicate taking or releasing access to a shared resource, but they use the inherited methods to block while waiting for access to shared resources. 類別衍生自包括：The classes derived from include: - 類別。The class. 請參閱[Mutex](~/docs/standard/threading/mutexes.md)。See [Mutexes](~/docs/standard/threading/mutexes.md). - 類別和其衍生的類別，和。The class and its derived classes, and . [EventWaitHandle、AutoResetEvent、CountdownEvent、ManualResetEvent](~/docs/standard/threading/eventwaithandle-autoresetevent-countdownevent-manualresetevent.md)。See [EventWaitHandle, AutoResetEvent, CountdownEvent, ManualResetEvent](~/docs/standard/threading/eventwaithandle-autoresetevent-countdownevent-manualresetevent.md). - 類別。The class. 請參閱[Semaphore 和 SemaphoreSlim](~/docs/standard/threading/semaphore-and-semaphoreslim.md)。See [Semaphore and SemaphoreSlim](~/docs/standard/threading/semaphore-and-semaphoreslim.md). 個別的等候控制代碼上封鎖執行緒，可以將它所呼叫的執行個體方法，其中會由衍生自的類別繼承。Threads can block on an individual wait handle by calling the instance method , which is inherited by classes derived from . 在衍生的類別的差異在於其執行緒親和性。The derived classes of differ in their thread affinity. 事件等候控制代碼 (， ，和)，號誌沒有執行緒相似性; 任何執行緒可以發出信號的事件等候控制代碼或號誌。Event wait handles (, , and ) and semaphores do not have thread affinity; any thread can signal an event wait handle or semaphore. Mutex，相反地，沒有執行緒相似性;擁有 mutex 的執行緒必須釋放它，並會擲回例外狀況，如果執行緒呼叫上未擁有 mutex 的方法。Mutexes, on the other hand, do have thread affinity; the thread that owns a mutex must release it, and an exception is thrown if a thread calls the method on a mutex that it does not own. 因為類別衍生自，這些類別可以用來跨應用程式定義域界限同步處理執行緒的活動。Because the class derives from , these classes can be used to synchronize the activities of threads across application domain boundaries. 除了其衍生的類別，類別具有一些靜態方法，封鎖執行緒，直到其中一個或多個同步物件收到信號。In addition to its derived classes, the class has a number of static methods that block a thread until one or more synchronization objects receive a signal. 它們包括：These include: - 這可讓發出信號一個等候控制代碼，以及立即等候另一個執行緒。, which allows a thread to signal one wait handle and immediately wait on another. - 這可讓執行緒等候，直到在陣列中的所有等候控制代碼會都收到信號。, which allows a thread to wait until all the wait handles in an array receive a signal. - 這可讓執行緒等候，直到收到訊號的一組指定的等候控制代碼的任何一個。, which allows a thread to wait until any one of a specified set of wait handles has been signaled . 這些方法的多載提供放棄等候，並有機會先離開同步處理內容，再進入等候，讓其他執行緒使用的同步處理內容的逾時間隔。The overloads of these methods provide timeout intervals for abandoning the wait, and the opportunity to exit a synchronization context before entering the wait, allowing other threads to use the synchronization context. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用的類型或從中衍生的類型時，您應該處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type or a type derived from it, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置型別，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要處置它間接，使用的語言建構這類`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 「 使用物件，實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 實作模式。 implements the pattern. 請參閱[處置模式](~/docs/standard/design-guidelines/dispose-pattern.md)。See [Dispose Pattern](~/docs/standard/design-guidelines/dispose-pattern.md). 當您衍生自，使用屬性來儲存您的原生作業系統控制代碼。When you derive from , use the property to store your native operating system handle. 您不需要覆寫保護方法除非您使用其他的 unmanaged 的資源。You do not need to override the protected method unless you use additional unmanaged resources. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在兩個執行緒可以執行背景工作，並在主要執行緒等候工作完成使用靜態並方法類別。The following code example shows how two threads can do background tasks while the Main thread waits for the tasks to complete using the static and methods of the class. [!code-cpp[WaitHandle#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/WaitHandle/cpp/WaitHandle.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WaitHandle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/WaitHandle/CS/WaitHandle.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WaitHandle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/WaitHandle/VB/WaitHandle.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不保證是不可部分完成。This operation is not guaranteed to be atomic. 在目前的執行緒訊號後`toSignal`之前等候`toWaitOn`，另一個處理器執行的執行緒可能會發出信號`toWaitOn`或等候它。After the current thread signals `toSignal` but before it waits on `toWaitOn`, a thread that is running on another processor might signal `toWaitOn` or wait on it. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法多載來允許主執行緒發出信號已封鎖的執行緒，以及執行緒完成工作，然後等候。The following code example uses the method overload to allow the main thread to signal a blocked thread and then wait until the thread finishes a task. 範例啟動五個執行緒，讓他們封鎖以建立旗標與再發行每一個執行緒時間使用者按下 ENTER 鍵。The example starts five threads, allows them to block on an created with the flag, and then releases one thread each time the user presses the ENTER key. 此範例會排入佇列的另一個的五個執行緒，並釋放所有使用以建立旗標。The example then queues another five threads and releases them all using an created with the flag. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不保證是不可部分完成。This operation is not guaranteed to be atomic. 在目前的執行緒訊號後`toSignal`之前等候`toWaitOn`，另一個處理器執行的執行緒可能會發出信號`toWaitOn`或等候它。After the current thread signals `toSignal` but before it waits on `toWaitOn`, a thread that is running on another processor might signal `toWaitOn` or wait on it. 如果`millisecondsTimeout`為零，此方法不會封鎖。If `millisecondsTimeout` is zero, the method does not block. 它會測試的狀態`toWaitOn`並立即傳回。It tests the state of the `toWaitOn` and returns immediately. ## 在結束內容的資訊Notes on Exiting the Context `exitContext`參數沒有任何作用，除非從非預設受管理的內容中呼叫方法。The `exitContext` parameter has no effect unless the method is called from inside a nondefault managed context. 如果您的執行緒是衍生自類別的執行個體的呼叫在此情形。This can happen if your thread is inside a call to an instance of a class derived from . 即使您目前正在執行的方法不是衍生自的類別上，例如，您可以在非預設內容中如果您目前的應用程式定義域中的堆疊上。Even if you are currently executing a method on a class that does not derive from , like , you can be in a nondefault context if a is on your stack in the current application domain. 時的非預設內容中執行您的程式碼，在指定`true`的`exitContext`造成執行緒結束的非預設的 managed 的內容 (也就是轉換成預設內容) 執行之前方法。When your code is executing in a nondefault context, specifying `true` for `exitContext` causes the thread to exit the nondefault managed context (that is, to transition to the default context) before executing the method. 執行緒在呼叫之後返回原始的非預設內容方法完成。The thread returns to the original nondefault context after the call to the method completes. 這有助於進行內容繫結類別具有。This can be useful when the context-bound class has . 在此情況下，所有呼叫類別的成員會自動同步都處理，並同步處理領域是類別程式碼的整個主體。In that case, all calls to members of the class are automatically synchronized, and the synchronization domain is the entire body of code for the class. 如果成員的呼叫堆疊中的程式碼會呼叫方法，並指定`true`如`exitContext`，執行緒結束同步處理網域，讓執行緒上呼叫物件的任何成員，以繼續進行封鎖。If code in the call stack of a member calls the method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed. 當方法傳回時，進行呼叫的執行緒必須等待重新輸入一次同步處理領域。When the method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是.NET Framework 2.0 版中的新功能。 is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 在舊版中，方法會傳回`true`時放棄的 mutex。In previous versions, the method returns `true` when a mutex is abandoned. 已放棄的 mutex 通常表示嚴重的程式碼錯誤。An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error. 如果是全系統 mutex，則可能表示，應用程式已意外終止 （例如，透過使用 Windows 工作管理員）。In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager). 例外狀況包含資訊適用於偵錯。The exception contains information useful for debugging. 方法會傳回所有控制代碼會收到信號。The method returns when all the handles are signaled. 在某些實作中，若傳遞了 64 個以上的控制代碼，就會擲回。On some implementations, if more than 64 handles are passed, a is thrown. 如果陣列包含重複的項目，則呼叫會失敗並。If the array contains duplicates, the call fails with a . > [!NOTE] > 擁有的執行緒上不支援方法。The method is not supported on threads that have . 呼叫這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，並指定-1 (或) 的`millisecondsTimeout`並`true`如`exitContext`。Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying -1 (or ) for `millisecondsTimeout` and `true` for `exitContext`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用執行緒集區，以非同步方式建立和寫入檔案群組。The following code example shows how to use the thread pool to asynchronously create and write to a group of files. 完成後，工作項目以及訊號每一個寫入作業已排入佇列。Each write operation is queued as a work item and signals when it is finished. 主執行緒等候發出信號的所有項目，然後結束。The main thread waits for all the items to signal and then exits. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll1/CPP/source1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll1/CS/source1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitAll1/VB/source1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`millisecondsTimeout`為零，此方法不會封鎖。If `millisecondsTimeout` is zero, the method does not block. 它會測試等候控制代碼的狀態，並立即傳回。It tests the state of the wait handles and returns immediately. 是.NET Framework 2.0 版中的新功能。 is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 在舊版中，方法會傳回`true`時放棄的 mutex。In previous versions, the method returns `true` when a mutex is abandoned. 已放棄的 mutex 通常表示嚴重的程式碼錯誤。An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error. 如果是全系統 mutex，則可能表示，應用程式已意外終止 （例如，透過使用 Windows 工作管理員）。In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager). 例外狀況包含資訊適用於偵錯。The exception contains information useful for debugging. 方法會傳回在等候終止時，這表示所有控制代碼會收到信號或逾時發生時。The method returns when the wait terminates, which means either when all the handles are signaled or when time-out occurs. 在某些實作中，若傳遞了 64 個以上的控制代碼，就會擲回。On some implementations, if more than 64 handles are passed, a is thrown. 如果陣列中有重複的項目，則呼叫會失敗並。If there are duplicates in the array, the call fails with a . > [!NOTE] > 擁有的執行緒上不支援方法。The method is not supported on threads that have . ## 在結束內容的資訊Notes on Exiting the Context `exitContext`參數沒有任何作用，除非從非預設受管理的內容中呼叫方法。The `exitContext` parameter has no effect unless the method is called from inside a nondefault managed context. 如果您的執行緒是衍生自類別的執行個體的呼叫在此情形。This can happen if your thread is inside a call to an instance of a class derived from . 即使您目前正在執行的方法不衍生自的類別上，例如，您可以在非預設內容中如果您目前的應用程式定義域中的堆疊上。Even if you are currently executing a method on a class that is not derived from , like , you can be in a nondefault context if a is on your stack in the current application domain. 時的非預設內容中執行您的程式碼，在指定`true`的`exitContext`造成執行緒結束的非預設的 managed 的內容 (也就是轉換成預設內容) 執行之前方法。When your code is executing in a nondefault context, specifying `true` for `exitContext` causes the thread to exit the nondefault managed context (that is, to transition to the default context) before executing the method. 執行緒在呼叫之後返回原始的非預設內容方法完成。The thread returns to the original nondefault context after the call to the method completes. 這有助於進行內容繫結類別具有屬性。This can be useful when the context-bound class has the attribute. 在此情況下，所有呼叫類別的成員會自動同步都處理，並同步處理領域是類別程式碼的整個主體。In that case, all calls to members of the class are automatically synchronized, and the synchronization domain is the entire body of code for the class. 如果成員的呼叫堆疊中的程式碼會呼叫方法，並指定`true`如`exitContext`，執行緒結束同步處理網域，讓執行緒上呼叫物件的任何成員，以繼續進行封鎖。If code in the call stack of a member calls the method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed. 當方法傳回時，進行呼叫的執行緒必須等待重新輸入一次同步處理領域。When the method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用執行緒集區，以非同步方式建立和寫入檔案群組。The following code example shows how to use the thread pool to asynchronously create and write to a group of files. 完成後，工作項目以及訊號每一個寫入作業已排入佇列。Each write operation is queued as a work item and signals when it is finished. 主執行緒等候發出信號的所有項目，然後結束。The main thread waits for all the items to signal and then exits. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是.NET Framework 2.0 版中的新功能。 is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 在舊版中，方法會傳回`true`如果等候完成，因為已放棄 mutex。In previous versions, the method returns `true` if the wait completes because a mutex is abandoned. 已放棄的 mutex 通常表示嚴重的程式碼錯誤。An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error. 如果是全系統 mutex，則可能表示，應用程式已意外終止 （例如，透過使用 Windows 工作管理員）。In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager). 例外狀況包含資訊適用於偵錯。The exception contains information useful for debugging. 方法會擲回只等待完成時因為遭到放棄的 mutex。The method throws an only when the wait completes because of an abandoned mutex. 如果`waitHandles`包含具有較低的索引編號，已放棄的 mutex，比釋放的 mutex方法正常完成，並不會擲回例外狀況。If `waitHandles` contains a released mutex with a lower index number than the abandoned mutex, the method completes normally and the exception is not thrown. > [!NOTE] > 在版本早於 2.0 版中，如果執行緒結束或中止而不需要明確地釋放的.NET framework ，且`Mutex`位於索引 0 （零），在`WaitAny`陣列在另一個執行緒，所傳回的索引上`WaitAny`是128 而不是 0。In versions of the .NET Framework earlier than version 2.0, if a thread exits or aborts without explicitly releasing a , and that `Mutex` is at index 0 (zero) in a `WaitAny` array on another thread, the index returned by `WaitAny` is 128 instead of 0. 這個方法會傳回任何控制代碼會收到信號。This method returns when any handle is signaled. 如果在呼叫期間，多個物件會變成收到訊號，則傳回的值會是物件的已收到訊號具有已收到訊號的所有物件的最小的索引值的陣列索引。If more than one object becomes signaled during the call, the return value is the array index of the signaled object with the smallest index value of all the signaled objects. 在某些實作中，如果有多個傳遞 64 的控制代碼，就會擲回。On some implementations, if more that 64 handles are passed, a is thrown. 呼叫這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，並指定-1 (或) 的`millisecondsTimeout`並`true`如`exitContext`。Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying -1 (or ) for `millisecondsTimeout` and `true` for `exitContext`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法。The following code example demonstrates calling the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`millisecondsTimeout`為零，此方法不會封鎖。If `millisecondsTimeout` is zero, the method does not block. 它會測試等候控制代碼的狀態，並立即傳回。It tests the state of the wait handles and returns immediately. 方法會擲回只等待完成時因為遭到放棄的 mutex。The method throws an only when the wait completes because of an abandoned mutex. 如果`waitHandles`包含具有較低的索引編號，已放棄的 mutex，比釋放的 mutex方法正常完成，並不會擲回例外狀況。If `waitHandles` contains a released mutex with a lower index number than the abandoned mutex, the method completes normally and the exception is not thrown. 這個方法傳回時則等候會終止，任何控制代碼會收到信號或發生逾時。This method returns when the wait terminates, either when any of the handles are signaled or when a timeout occurs. 如果在呼叫期間，多個物件會變成收到訊號，則傳回的值會是物件的已收到訊號具有已收到訊號的所有物件的最小的索引值的陣列索引。If more than one object becomes signaled during the call, the return value is the array index of the signaled object with the smallest index value of all the signaled objects. 在某些實作中，如果有多個傳遞 64 的控制代碼，就會擲回。On some implementations, if more that 64 handles are passed, a is thrown. 呼叫這個方法多載等同於呼叫多載，並指定`false`如`exitContext`。Calling this method overload is the same as calling the overload and specifying `false` for `exitContext`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`millisecondsTimeout`為零，此方法不會封鎖。If `millisecondsTimeout` is zero, the method does not block. 它會測試等候控制代碼的狀態，並立即傳回。It tests the state of the wait handles and returns immediately. 是.NET Framework 2.0 版中的新功能。 is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 在舊版中，方法會傳回`true`如果等候完成，因為已放棄 mutex。In previous versions, the method returns `true` if the wait completes because a mutex is abandoned. 已放棄的 mutex 通常表示嚴重的程式碼錯誤。An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error. 如果是全系統 mutex，則可能表示，應用程式已意外終止 （例如，透過使用 Windows 工作管理員）。In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager). 例外狀況包含資訊適用於偵錯。The exception contains information useful for debugging. 方法會擲回只等待完成時因為遭到放棄的 mutex。The method throws an only when the wait completes because of an abandoned mutex. 如果`waitHandles`包含具有較低的索引編號，已放棄的 mutex，比釋放的 mutex方法正常完成，並不會擲回例外狀況。If `waitHandles` contains a released mutex with a lower index number than the abandoned mutex, the method completes normally and the exception is not thrown. > [!NOTE] > 在版本早於 2.0 版中，如果執行緒結束或中止而不需要明確地釋放的.NET framework ，且`Mutex`位於索引 0 （零），在`WaitAny`陣列在另一個執行緒，所傳回的索引上`WaitAny`是128 而不是 0。In versions of the .NET Framework earlier than version 2.0, if a thread exits or aborts without explicitly releasing a , and that `Mutex` is at index 0 (zero) in a `WaitAny` array on another thread, the index returned by `WaitAny` is 128 instead of 0. 這個方法傳回時則等候會終止，任何控制代碼會收到信號或發生逾時。This method returns when the wait terminates, either when any of the handles are signaled or when a timeout occurs. 如果在呼叫期間，多個物件會變成收到訊號，則傳回的值會是物件的已收到訊號具有已收到訊號的所有物件的最小的索引值的陣列索引。If more than one object becomes signaled during the call, the return value is the array index of the signaled object with the smallest index value of all the signaled objects. 在某些實作中，如果有多個傳遞 64 的控制代碼，就會擲回。On some implementations, if more that 64 handles are passed, a is thrown. ## 在結束內容的資訊Notes on Exiting the Context `exitContext`參數沒有任何作用，除非從非預設受管理的內容中呼叫方法。The `exitContext` parameter has no effect unless the method is called from inside a nondefault managed context. 如果您的執行緒是衍生自類別的執行個體的呼叫在此情形。This can happen if your thread is inside a call to an instance of a class derived from . 即使您目前正在執行的方法不是衍生自的類別上，例如，您可以在非預設內容中如果您目前的應用程式定義域中的堆疊上。Even if you are currently executing a method on a class that does not derive from , like , you can be in a nondefault context if a is on your stack in the current application domain. 時的非預設內容中執行您的程式碼，在指定`true`的`exitContext`造成執行緒結束的非預設的 managed 的內容 (也就是轉換成預設內容) 執行之前方法。When your code is executing in a nondefault context, specifying `true` for `exitContext` causes the thread to exit the nondefault managed context (that is, to transition to the default context) before executing the method. 執行緒在呼叫之後返回原始的非預設內容方法完成。The thread returns to the original nondefault context after the call to the method completes. 這有助於進行內容繫結類別具有。This can be useful when the context-bound class has . 在此情況下，所有呼叫類別的成員會自動同步都處理，並同步處理領域是類別程式碼的整個主體。In that case, all calls to members of the class are automatically synchronized, and the synchronization domain is the entire body of code for the class. 如果成員的呼叫堆疊中的程式碼會呼叫方法，並指定`true`如`exitContext`，執行緒結束同步處理網域，讓執行緒上呼叫物件的任何成員，以繼續進行封鎖。If code in the call stack of a member calls the method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed. 當方法傳回時，進行呼叫的執行緒必須等待重新輸入一次同步處理領域。When the method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用執行緒集區同時搜尋多個磁碟上的檔案。The following code example demonstrates how to use the thread pool to simultaneously search for a file on multiple disks. 如需空間考量，會搜尋只有每個磁碟的根目錄。For space considerations, only the root directory of each disk is searched. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是.NET Framework 2.0 版中的新功能。 is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 在舊版中，方法會傳回`true`時放棄的 mutex。In previous versions, the method returns `true` when a mutex is abandoned. 已放棄的 mutex 通常表示嚴重的程式碼錯誤。An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error. 如果是全系統 mutex，則可能表示，應用程式已意外終止 （例如，透過使用 Windows 工作管理員）。In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager). 例外狀況包含資訊適用於偵錯。The exception contains information useful for debugging. 這個方法會封鎖目前的執行個體之前，無限期的呼叫端會收到信號。The caller of this method blocks indefinitely until the current instance receives a signal. 使用這個方法來封鎖直到從另一個執行緒收到訊號，例如便會產生非同步作業完成時。Use this method to block until a receives a signal from another thread, such as is generated when an asynchronous operation completes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱介面。For more information, see the interface. 呼叫這個方法多載就相當於呼叫方法多載，並指定-1 或是第一個參數和`false`第二個參數。Calling this method overload is equivalent to calling the method overload and specifying -1 or for the first parameter and `false` for the second parameter. 覆寫這個方法以自訂在衍生類別的行為。Override this method to customize the behavior of derived classes. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用等候控制代碼，以防止處理程序結束時等候背景執行緒完成執行。The following code example shows how to use a wait handle to keep a process from terminating while it waits for a background thread to finish executing. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`millisecondsTimeout`為零，此方法不會封鎖。If `millisecondsTimeout` is zero, the method does not block. 它會測試等候控制代碼的狀態，並立即傳回。It tests the state of the wait handle and returns immediately. 是.NET Framework 2.0 版中的新功能。 is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 在舊版中，方法會傳回`true`時放棄的 mutex。In previous versions, the method returns `true` when a mutex is abandoned. 已放棄的 mutex 通常表示嚴重的程式碼錯誤。An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error. 如果是全系統 mutex，則可能表示，應用程式已意外終止 （例如，透過使用 Windows 工作管理員）。In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager). 例外狀況包含資訊適用於偵錯。The exception contains information useful for debugging. 這個方法會封鎖，直到目前的執行個體收到信號或逾時的呼叫端就會發生。The caller of this method blocks until the current instance receives a signal or a time-out occurs. 使用這個方法來封鎖直到從另一個執行緒收到訊號，例如便會產生非同步作業完成時。Use this method to block until a receives a signal from another thread, such as is generated when an asynchronous operation completes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱介面。For more information, see the interface. 覆寫這個方法以自訂在衍生類別的行為。Override this method to customize the behavior of derived classes. ## 在結束內容的資訊Notes on Exiting the Context `exitContext`參數沒有任何作用，除非從非預設受管理的內容中呼叫方法。The `exitContext` parameter has no effect unless the method is called from inside a nondefault managed context. 如果您的執行緒是衍生自類別的執行個體的呼叫在此情形。This can happen if your thread is inside a call to an instance of a class derived from . 即使您目前正在執行的方法不是衍生自的類別上，例如，您可以在非預設內容中如果您目前的應用程式定義域中的堆疊上。Even if you are currently executing a method on a class that does not derive from , like , you can be in a nondefault context if a is on your stack in the current application domain. 時的非預設內容中執行您的程式碼，在指定`true`的`exitContext`造成執行緒結束的非預設的 managed 的內容 (也就是轉換成預設內容) 執行之前方法。When your code is executing in a nondefault context, specifying `true` for `exitContext` causes the thread to exit the nondefault managed context (that is, to transition to the default context) before executing the method. 執行緒在呼叫之後返回原始的非預設內容方法完成。The thread returns to the original nondefault context after the call to the method completes. 這有助於進行內容繫結類別具有。This can be useful when the context-bound class has . 在此情況下，所有呼叫類別的成員會自動同步都處理，並同步處理領域是類別程式碼的整個主體。In that case, all calls to members of the class are automatically synchronized, and the synchronization domain is the entire body of code for the class. 如果成員的呼叫堆疊中的程式碼會呼叫方法，並指定`true`如`exitContext`，執行緒結束同步處理網域，讓執行緒上呼叫物件的任何成員，以繼續進行封鎖。If code in the call stack of a member calls the method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed. 當方法傳回時，進行呼叫的執行緒必須等待重新輸入一次同步處理領域。When the method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何方法多載時就稱為同步處理網域中的行為。The following example shows how the method overload behaves when it is called within a synchronization domain. 首先，執行緒會等候與`exitContext`設定為`false`，直到等候的逾時到期。First, a thread waits with `exitContext` set to `false` and blocks until the wait timeout expires. 第二個執行緒執行之後的第一個執行緒終止，並與等候`exitContext`設定為`true`。A second thread executes after the first thread terminates and waits with `exitContext` set to `true`. 未封鎖的呼叫，以表示此第二個執行緒的等候控制代碼，並等候逾時之前完成的執行緒。The call to signal the wait handle for this second thread is not blocked, and the thread completes before the wait timeout. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`timeout`為零，此方法不會封鎖。If `timeout` is zero, the method does not block. 它會測試等候控制代碼的狀態，並立即傳回。It tests the state of the wait handle and returns immediately. 是.NET Framework 2.0 版中的新功能。 is new in the .NET Framework version 2.0. 在舊版中，方法會傳回`true`時放棄的 mutex。In previous versions, the method returns `true` when a mutex is abandoned. 已放棄的 mutex 通常表示嚴重的程式碼錯誤。An abandoned mutex often indicates a serious coding error. 如果是全系統 mutex，則可能表示，應用程式已意外終止 （例如，透過使用 Windows 工作管理員）。In the case of a system-wide mutex, it might indicate that an application has been terminated abruptly (for example, by using Windows Task Manager). 例外狀況包含資訊適用於偵錯。The exception contains information useful for debugging. 這個方法會封鎖，直到目前的執行個體收到信號或逾時的呼叫端就會發生。The caller of this method blocks until the current instance receives a signal or a time-out occurs. 使用這個方法來封鎖直到從另一個執行緒收到訊號，例如便會產生非同步作業完成時。Use this method to block until a receives a signal from another thread, such as is generated when an asynchronous operation completes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱介面。For more information, see the interface. 覆寫這個方法以自訂在衍生類別的行為。Override this method to customize the behavior of derived classes. 最大值`timeout`是。The maximum value for `timeout` is . ## 在結束內容的資訊Notes on Exiting the Context `exitContext`參數沒有任何作用，除非從非預設受管理的內容中呼叫方法。The `exitContext` parameter has no effect unless the method is called from inside a nondefault managed context. 如果您的執行緒是衍生自類別的執行個體的呼叫在此情形。This can happen if your thread is inside a call to an instance of a class derived from . 即使您目前正在執行的方法不是衍生自的類別上，例如，您可以在非預設內容中如果您目前的應用程式定義域中的堆疊上。Even if you are currently executing a method on a class that does not derive from , like , you can be in a nondefault context if a is on your stack in the current application domain. 時的非預設內容中執行您的程式碼，在指定`true`的`exitContext`造成執行緒結束的非預設的 managed 的內容 (也就是轉換成預設內容) 執行之前方法。When your code is executing in a nondefault context, specifying `true` for `exitContext` causes the thread to exit the nondefault managed context (that is, to transition to the default context) before executing the method. 執行緒在呼叫之後返回原始的非預設內容方法完成。The thread returns to the original nondefault context after the call to the method completes. 這有助於進行內容繫結類別具有。This can be useful when the context-bound class has . 在此情況下，所有呼叫類別的成員會自動同步都處理，並同步處理領域是類別程式碼的整個主體。In that case, all calls to members of the class are automatically synchronized, and the synchronization domain is the entire body of code for the class. 如果成員的呼叫堆疊中的程式碼會呼叫方法，並指定`true`如`exitContext`，執行緒結束同步處理網域，讓執行緒上呼叫物件的任何成員，以繼續進行封鎖。If code in the call stack of a member calls the method and specifies `true` for `exitContext`, the thread exits the synchronization domain, allowing a thread that is blocked on a call to any member of the object to proceed. 當方法傳回時，進行呼叫的執行緒必須等待重新輸入一次同步處理領域。When the method returns, the thread that made the call must wait to reenter the synchronization domain. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用等候控制代碼，以防止處理程序結束時等候背景執行緒完成執行。The following code example shows how to use a wait handle to keep a process from terminating while it waits for a background thread to finish executing. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne3#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne3/CPP/source3.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne3/CS/source3.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.WaitHandle.WaitOne3/VB/source3.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此欄位是其中一個可能的傳回值的`WaitAny`。This field is one of the possible return values of `WaitAny`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用執行緒集區同時搜尋多個磁碟上的檔案。The following code example demonstrates how to use the thread pool to simultaneously search for a file on multiple disks. 如需空間考量，會搜尋只有每個磁碟的根目錄。For space considerations, only the root directory of each disk is searched.
